title: Opus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian and gluten free choices are clearly labeled and most vegetarian dishes can be made vegan upon request. There is a bar in the dining area and a lounge downstairs great for a night out. Staff is knowledgeable about veganism and is also accommodating.
